20101204070539.571|20101204070541.000|CCO|SO FED UP, THEY SPENT $8 ZOI BUY

20101204070719.000|20101204070721.000|CCO|THEY'RE WILLING TO WORK OUT A 
20101204070721.000|20101204070722.429|CCO|COMPROMISE AND WILL SIT DOWN AND
